finding: Validation errors not announced to screen readers
observation: P3 (NVDA user): 'I submitted blank title twice but heard no error. Had to navigate back to check what went wrong.' Two validation_error entries with no audio feedback.
P2 (keyboard-only): 'Tab key got stuck in edit form. Took 56 seconds to escape and continue task.' keyboard_trap outcome, task time 14234ms vs 7456ms baseline.
P4 (No-JS keyboard): 'After saving edit, focus disappeared. Had to Tab from top of page again.' focus_lost outcome shows focus management issue.

finding: No visual focus indicator on buttons
observation: P2: 'Using Tab I cannot see which button I'm on. The outline is invisible.' P4: 'Focus indicator missing on edit and delete buttons.'

data_source: metrics.csv L15-16 + P1 notes 09:31 + P3 notes 10:02
observation: P1: 'Error just says invalid but doesn't tell me what to fix.' P3: 'After two tries I still didn't know title was required.' Unclear error messaging.

finding: Filter results lack ARIA live region
observation: P3: 'After filtering NVDA didn't announce how many results. Had to navigate to list manually.' No aria-live on filter results container.
P1: 'With many tasks all items look identical hard to prioritize.' P2: 'No color coding or grouping makes scanning difficult during navigation task.'
P1: 'Delete button text is hard to read in bright light.' axe scan: Button #767676 on #FFFFFF = 2.8:1 (fails 4.5:1 AA minimum for text).

finding: No success confirmation for screen readers
observation: P3: 'After adding task I got no confirmation. Had to check list manually.' P5 (re-pilot with NVDA): 'Would prefer to hear task added successfully.'
